mapper.select: select *from calenderInfo where mem_id = #{memId} and m_board_no = #{mBoardNo}
mapper.insert:
select schedule_seq.nextval from dual
insert into schedule(schedule_no,mem_no,schedule_start,schedule_end,schedule_title,schedule_content,my_board_no) values(#{scheduleNo},#{memNo},#{schedulStart},#{schedulEnd},#{schedulTitle},#{schedulContent},#{myBoardNo})
